meanings.definition: The number equivalent to the sum of two and two.
meanings.sent1: I have four apples in my bag.
meanings.sent2: The table has four legs for support.
meanings.sent3: The four friends decided to go on a picnic together.
meanings.sent4: She divided the cake into four equal parts.
meanings.sent5: The four seasons are spring, summer, autumn, and winter.

meanings.definition: A group or set of four people or things.
meanings.sent1: There are four chairs around the table.
meanings.sent2: The band consists of four musicians.
meanings.sent3: The four siblings always play together in the park.
meanings.sent4: The four corners of the room were decorated with flowers.
meanings.sent5: The four-leaf clover is considered lucky.

meanings.sent1: She wore a dress with four buttons.
meanings.sent2: The cake was cut into four slices.
meanings.sent3: He made a four-layer sandwich for lunch.
meanings.sent4: The four kittens played in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The four sides of the square are equal in length.
